content: Non-White is a boss you will encounter naturally as you progress through the story. After interacting with the Child Buddha, you will be tasked with finding and resonating with the four Buddha statues hidden around the area. Once you've done that, head up the steps at the back of the clearing to enter the cave system.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Non-White_Spirit.md', within the main section titled 'Non-White Spirit', specifically from the subsection 'Non-White Location'.
The content is as follows:
Non-White is a boss you will encounter naturally as you progress through the story. After interacting with the Child Buddha, you will be tasked with finding and resonating with the four Buddha statues hidden around the area. Once you've done that, head up the steps at the back of the clearing to enter the cave system.
